author: christine odera
text: Happy International Peace Day 2021! author: christine odera
text: According to the recently launched #YouthDevelopmentindex by the @commonwealthsec the gender gap in feeling safe is the widest. More men feel safe while more women feel unsafe. As we celebrate #IYD2021  ponder on this. @GimacYouth @GimacNetwork @CYPANOFFICIAL @AndereKE @KarshK https://t.co/tOAovPWjlF

author: christine odera
text: The #YDI informs policy-makers about youth needs and opportunities, indicating areas of success and where attention. investment is needed. It  acts as a data advocacy tool, highlighting the importance of gathering statistics on key youth indicators in order to achieve SDGs . https://t.co/x0oEuaNvam
